title: Github Action部署后hexo主题不生效
content:
1. 先安装 hexo-deployer-git，执行以下命令：npm install hexo-deployer-git

2. 打开全局配置文件 _config.yml,在最底下修改部署的方式和仓库：# Deployment## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deploymentdeploy:  type: git  repo: https://github.com/f2511571150/f2511571150.github.io #生成静态页面的地址  # example, https://github.com/<username>/<user>.github.io  branch: gh-pages 

3. 清空缓存文件和静态文件(public)：hexo clean

4. 重新生成静态文件:hexo g 

5. 部署网站:hexo d

注意：如果执行 ‘hexo d’ 命令的时候报以下错误:
FATAL {  err: Error: Spawn failed      at ChildProcess.<anonymous> (D:\myblog\source\node_modules\hexo-util\lib\spawn.js:51:21)      at ChildProcess.emit (node:events:390:28)      at ChildProcess.cp.emit (D:\myblog\source\node_modules\cross-spawn\lib\enoent.js:34:29)      at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (node:internal/child_process:290:12) {    code: 128  }} Something's wrong. Maybe you can find the solution here: %s https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html

这个时候先把生成的 .deploy_git 文件删除掉，然后重复上面的第三步和第五步即可，要是还报错就继续重复步骤。
